document_title: Climate Change Impact on German Alpine Lakes 2021
content_text: Study on the effects of climate change on water quality parameters in German alpine lakes. Analysis of temperature trends and their impact on algal growth.
author: Prof. Dr. Klaus Weber

document_title: German Lakes Water Quality Monitoring Network 2021
content_text: Federal monitoring data from UBA sensors across major German lakes and water bodies. Comprehensive analysis of spatial and temporal patterns.
author: Dr. Anna Fischer
